KUAN-JU WU

Kuan-Ju’s work explores the aesthetics that result from constructive processes and tangible interaction between people and kinetic systems.

Exhibition

TOOL, Cooper Hewitt Design Museum, Dec 2014 - June 2015, New York City, USA, (Sketchbot)
Interacción I/O/I, Disseny Hub Barcelona, June 2011 - August 2012, Barcelona, Spain. (GIFFI)
Three River Festival, Assemble Gallery, June 3 2011, Pittsburgh, USA. (GIFFI, ROBBBUTTERFLY,PLUNKO)
Maker Faire Bay Area, San Mateo County Event Center, May 20 - 22 2011, San Mateo, USA. (GIFFI)
3DDC, Rayburn House Office Building, April 28 2011, Washington, DC, USA, (Cutter)
Superhero Costume Design Competition, TEI11 Conference, Jan 23- 26 2011, Madeira, Portugal. (Kung Fu Suit)
Maker Faire NY, New York Hall of Science, Sep 24 - 26 2010, New York, USA. (Cutter)
Frame Gallery, May 1 - 4 2010, Pittsburgh, USA. (Head Monster)

Professional

Lead Technologist, 2011-Present, Tellart LLC, Providence, RI.
Instructor: Sensor Driven Story Telling - Internet of Trees, Industrial Design, Rhode Island School of Design, Providence, RI
Instructor: Creative Imaging Lab, 2016 Spring, Digital + Media, Rhode Island School of Design, Providence, RI
Guest Critic: Drawing Machine, 2015 Fall, Industrial Design, Rhode Island School of Design, Providence, RI
Teaching Assistant, 2011 Spring, School of Design, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA.
Artist Assistant, 2010 Summer, Ian Ingram Studio, Pittsburgh, PA.
Lecturer, 2010 Spring, School of Architecture, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA.
Research Assistant, 2007, Creativity Lab, Industrial Technology Research Institute, Hsinchu,Taiwan.

Education

2010 MtID, Master of Tangible Interaction Design, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA
2007 BS, Bachelor in Electronic Engineering, National Chiao Tung University, Taiwan
2007 Certificate, Digital Content Program, National Chiao Tung University, Taiwan

Publications

Wu, K.-J., Baskinger, M., and Gross, M., GIFFI: A Gift for Future Inventor. In Proc. TEI '12, ACM (2012).
Willis, K.D.D., Xu, C., Wu, K.-J., Levin, G. and Gross, M.D., Interactive Fabrication: New Interfaces for Digital Fabrication. In Proc. TEI '11, ACM (2011).
Wu, K.-J. and Gross, M., TOPAOKO: interactive construction kit. Ext. Abstracts CHI '10, ACM (2010), 3619-3624.
